TopicTitle: HELP! Can KAS add fuel lines to a ship?

Articles.Content: I am building my first interplanetary ship in LKO, so far so good. However, for some reason the fuel lines from my main fuel tank to outboard LV-Ns has disappeared! Can I use KAS to install new fuel lines to solve the problem?
You could probably post in the thread for KAS. Anyways, theres a radial fuel port thing, so, you should be able to, I think.
YES! just add two pipe ends, connect them, and then select which one you are going to. (or from, I forget which)
